segments.text: Did you hear about that accident on the 5 ? There was a sixty-two-car pile up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No kidding ! When did that happen ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . And a semi jack-knifed trying to miss a stalled car in the fast lane . You can imagine what happened after that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sixty two cars . Oath . Do they know how many casualties yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The count is up to seven right now and several are in critical condition .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's amazingly low for such a huge accident !
segments.speaker: S2
